languages.text: "Несомненно, Атлас нужно уничтожить. Но нельзя наказывать весь Дом за грехи Тисифоны!"

traits.locale_text: "Несомненно, Атлас нужно уничтожить. Но нельзя наказывать весь Дом за грехи Тисифоны!"

languages.text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, Атлас нужно уничтожить. Но нельзя наказывать весь Дом за грехи Тисифоны!"

traits.locale_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes!"
"The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes!"
"The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes!"
"The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes!"
"The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"
"The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

languages.text: 「アトラスを破壊しなくてはならないのは確かだ。しかし、ティシフォンの罪をオーセリオ家一同が償うとは到底思えない」
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: 「アトラスを破壊しなくてはならないのは確かだ。しかし、ティシフォンの罪をオーセリオ家一同が償うとは到底思えない」

languages.text: “圣仪必须摧毁，但不能让整个奥赛罗家族为提西福涅犯下的罪行付出代价，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: “圣仪必须摧毁，但不能让整个奥赛罗家族为提西福涅犯下的罪行付出代价！”

languages.text: « L'Atlas doit certes être détruit, mais vous ne pouvez pas demander à toute une maison de payer pour les crimes de Tisiphone ! »
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: « L'Atlas doit certes être détruit, mais vous ne pouvez pas demander à toute une maison de payer pour les crimes de Tisiphone ! »

languages.text: «El Atlas debe ser destruido, sin duda, pero ¿crees que puedes esperar que toda la casa pague por los crímenes de Tisiphone?».
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: «El Atlas debe ser destruido, sin duda, pero ¡no puedes esperar que toda la casa pague por los crímenes de Tisiphone!».

languages.text: "Der Atlas muss zerstört werden, keine Frage. Doch gewiss kann man nicht das gesamte Haus für Tisiphones Verbrechen bestrafen?!"
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Atlas muss zerstört werden, keine Frage. Doch gewiss kann man nicht erwarten, dass das gesamte Haus für Tisiphones Verbrechen bestraft wird!"

languages.text: "Atlas'ın yok edilmesi şart. Lakin Tisiphone'nin suçları uğruna koca bir Hane'nin cezalandırılmasını bekliyor olamazsın."
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must certainly be destroyed. But surely the entire House cannot be expected to serve penance for Tisiphone's crimes?"

traits.locale_text: "Atlas'ın mutlaka yok edilmesi şart. Lakin Tisiphone'nin suçları uğruna tüm Hanenin cezalandırılmasını beklemiyorsundur herhâlde."
